Title: Core Beliefs and Mindsets for Success with Dr. Jordan Peterson
Description:
Today, we’ll hear about:

•      How to uncover your core values with Dr. Jordan Peterson

•      This could make or break your business with Dr. Jordan Peterson

•      This caused Dr. Jordan Peterson to change his political thinking

•      Dave Ramsey’s favorite rule from Dr. Peterson’s 12 Rules for Life
